Greetings from Fu Zhang (å¼ è¾…). I explore and research in the field of human-computer interactions with multidisciplinary experiences in computer science, electronic engineering and software engineering. I graduated from King's College London with a first BEng and a distinction MSc degree. Followed by a software engineer career at Huawei. I am currently employed in the Hong Kong Polytechnic University as a research assistant.

I am a fan of Arsenal FC and Henan FC. Off work, I often watching football, playing video games, watching animation and playing music, and very importantly, travel.
